tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From my very first meeting till my post surgery visits it has been a wonderful experience with Dr. Loveleena Nadir Ma'am. I received  the much needed assurance and understanding from her. Her presence and communication really put me on ease. The surgery and the whole treatment process got easy to undergo. We all feel uncertain and clueless at some point while facing health crisis and we look forward to our doctor for all the answers. I am happy to say at every step I got support from her. Me and my whole family is thankful to her for all her time,help and understanding. As a doctor and as a person she is really awesome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs nothing more important than our good health -That‚Äôs our principal capital asset‚Äù.

With this thought in our mind, we started our search for a good healthcare provider for our pregnancy journey. Pregnancy is a journey full of excitement yet challenging for every woman and finding the right gynaecologist makes the journey smoother.
While the transition to parenthood comes with new challenges, it has been a DELIGHTFUL experience to be treated by  Dr.Loveleena Nadir at Fortis La Femme.  My experience from the start has been in one word ‚ÄòAWESOME‚Äô.
From our very first visit to Dr. Nadir at the hospital, we were welcomed with a broad smile, positive energy and loads of enthusiasm. Her distinguished aura was extremely soothing and maternal as we were made to feel very comfortable while she took the time to explain everything well and answered all our queries patiently. She gave us a lot of her valuable inputs on what was lying ahead of us and explained major milestones during our journey which instilled the faith in us putting all our fears to rest. We came out of her chamber feeling extremely happy, confident and sure that the quest for our best healthcare provider ends with her. 

Dr. Loveleena Nadir is a miracle in the field of medicine with an extensive experience and unparalleled commitment which is definitely unmatched. She is the perfect blend of a highly competent medical professional and a compassionate human being. She is an extremely confident, proficient and highly qualified gynaecologist & obstetrician, who was always very approachable and meticulously gave us very actionable advice through each step. Her practical, flexible and reasonable approach gave us the reassurance that everything was going well during our journey. I had an exhilarating and a very soul satisfying birth experience as I delivered my healthy daughter this February under the leadership and guidance of Dr. Loveleena. She prioritised the baby's health and growth and ensured that both the baby and myself were doing well before and after the pregnancy.

"Not all angels have wings some have stethoscopes‚Äù, hence proved as Dr. Loveleena was truly an angel in disguise for us. As we hold our little girl in our arms, we feel immensely grateful and deeply thankful to Dr. Loveleena for making our journey a memorable one and shall strongly recommend her to all would- be -mothers for a happy and peaceful pregnancy journey and can assure that you would be in loving and capable hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Multiple uterine fibroids-this prolonged illness i was suffering from more than a year and couldnt find any assurance from any gynaecologists.I consulted three gynaecologists before meeting Dr.Loveleena. Even one gynae scared me and was not much confident of Hysteroscopic + Laproscopic Myomectomy as she said that fibroids are very abnormal and she had never encountered such case.The moment she asked me to get a second opinion, i was very much possessive of finding an expert who can assure me the recovery from this illness without loosing my fertility.I am an unmarried so didnt want to effect my fertility. Then Dr.Loveleena,who proved to be a gem.I would say that the moment i met her first time i made up my mind to return to her only.Only she came out to be an assuring and most trustworthy doc for the treatment and recovery from this illness which any patient would seek from his doc.Right from the day of admission till the day of discharge she helped and coordinated with us regarding all admission formalities,paperwork,reports,tests etc. On the day,while i was in the OT being prepped for the surgery she was there for giving me strength as i was extreme nervous and scared.She found lil complications during my surgery but the way she handled is really admirable.I would rather say she cares like a mother for her patients. Post surgery also she was very much watchful whether medicines are being administered on time to her patient or not.Well now i am in the recovery stage post surgery and till date i am doing well in this phase. I cant stop being grateful to such a great doc and wish her future endeavours.May you be blessed with the happiness and love that you have given to society! Hats off to you :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Loveleena is a very experienced and friendly doctor. She comes with a lot of experience in handling Gynae cases. My mother was detected with a big dermoid cyst in her ovary. We visited numerous doctors but all of them told us that open surgery was the only option. We were scared because she already had one ovary removed earlier but it was a painful experience at that time. Then we came to know about Dr. Loveleena and decided to visit her.She looked into the details of the case and told us that her team can do the same surgery with Laproscopy as her team has a lot of experience in laproscopy and they have the advanced tools for doing that. We were highly relieved with the confidence that she had shown from the first day. We decided to give it a go. On the day of surgery, everything went smoothly and her laproscopic surgery was complete in 2-3 hours without any complications. She recovered quite well and was discharged within 2-3 days. Dr. Loveleena guided us during the whole process. We are quite happy with the way the whole surgery was done and how fast she recovered.Thanks a lot Dr. Loveleena. Highly recommended!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pregnancy,Pregnant,
review: We had been struggling with infertility for a year and a half before we had the good fortune of meeting Dr Lovleena Nadir. Highly frustrated, confused and post 1st covid lockdown we had the our first appointment with Dr Loveleena. From the first time we met her till after she delivered our twins, she has been a ray of positivity. She always guided us correctly and always wanted us to be treated and looked after by the best people in the field. My entire journey from infertility to ivf to pregnancy and finally to delivery was guided perfectly by Dr Loveleena. Even though she referred me to Dr Sunita Arora for the actual IVF procedure, she constantly kept a check on my progress. And l was more than happy to be referred back to Dr Loveleena as my primary gynaecologist. Today as l rock my perfectly healthy twins l am eternally grateful to Dr Loveleena for an amazing pregnancy and delivery experience. She goes out of the way to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. Always a phone call or text message away, highly prompt, efficient and up to date with all the latest information, Dr Loveleena is definitely my recommendation to anyone pregnant or planning to conceive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ********* ** **** ********** *** ** *** **** *************** ** *** ****** I started to see her during my first pregnancy. She was a great support for me from the start. At first, my pregnancy progressed normally however in the mid of my pregnancy I started having major complications. Dr Loveleena managed all my complications with utmost expertise and experience. She has great intuition and goes with her gut. She is a very positive doctor and is always just a call or whatsapp away. Even in the middle of the night she is available and responds with the most care. Her aura is very soothing and maternal and makes you feel very comfortable. Her experience in her field is definitely unmatched because she was always right about almost everything related to my pregnancy complications. She never gave up on me and my baby and made sure that I delivered a healthy baby at the end. I am thankful to her for delivering my beautiful daughter because if she wasn‚Äôt my doctor, I don‚Äôt think I would have been able to reach the stage of delivery due to all my pregnancy complications. She has been a real angel in disguise for me and I cannot recommend her enough. Not just me, but my entire family is very happy with her! ***** ********** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
As part of an out of turn check-up, I discovered a uterine fibroid that measured a huge 11.2 cm. Dr. Nadir has been my doctor since I was 15, so naturally I consulted with her even though I currently live in Hong Kong. On her advice, I got the tests ‚Äì MRI and PET Scan done to verify whether the fibroid was malignant. While I was worried about the possibility of cancer, I was constantly in touch with Dr. Nadir and followed her advice to get the marker blood test done. After the PET scan and blood test marker were clear, I decided to get the fibroid removed (myomectomy) with Dr. Nadir. No other doctor in Hong Kong was willing to do the myomectomy laparoscopically because of the huge size of the fibroid. 
So, I flew to India to get my surgery done under the very experienced hands of Dr. Nadir. The best part of going through her is that she makes you feel comfortable, explains what‚Äôs going on scientifically, is trustworthy and takes care of every small detail so you have a worry-free surgery. 
I am so grateful to Dr. Loveleena Nadir for the personal care and excellent treatment during my laparoscopic myomectomy surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: In 2019, I went for regular health checkup wherein I got cancer marker test done out of curiosity and my results for  CA-125 were out of range. The next thought which strikes your mind once you see something like this is bundles of negative thoughts... regular doctor visits, chemotherapy and what not. Finding a good & trustworthy doctor to show right path was very important . I feel blessed that I knew Dr Loveleena and then next thing to do was to call her rather than sink in negative thoughts. She pepped me and advised to do follow-up test and luckily the reason for high range was not cancer but endometriosis cyst. It bought such a relief to me and my  family members. Since then she guided me through the right treatment. She gave me confidence that it is normal case and with medication things will be better. Through out the treatment she was just a call away, always ready to motivate and say "don't worry you will be fine".. She carries such pleasing good vibes that you feel 50% recovered by seeing her ... I owe Big Thank you to you Dr Loveleena. Wish you good health and always be in high spirits. :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had a very positive and meaningful birth experience because of Dr Loveleena and the team at La Femme. I delivered normally and made a quick recovery.  The atmosphere in the labour room, under her leadership, was exhilarating and highly motivating. Dr Loveleena‚Äôs confidence, expertise and constant encouragement gave me the confidence as well as the patience to deliver normally. 
Her approach throughout the pregnancy was practical and flexible. She addressed all issues irrespective of it being a small or big issue and was always quick to respond via call/whatsapp. At every appointment, she answered all our questions patiently and gave us very actionable advice.  She prioritised the baby‚Äôs health and growth and ensured that both the baby and I were doing well both before and after the pregnancy. Would strongly recommend Dr Loveleena.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had Dr. Lovleena perform a fibroid operation for me and I was an ideal case of uterus removal.But my experience was so wonderful & soul satisfying that I got rid of a melon size fibroid with uterus safe and intact! Even when my surgery was so complex, Dr Lovleena helped me both as "mother care for her own kids" & as a very understanding and super knowledgeable Doc.  
If you are needing anything that Dr. Lovleena could help you with, I assure you that you would be in loving, capable hands!!

#Thank you Doctor/God Mother, for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor.‚Äù

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My name is Reema. Since 5 years I was facing a lot of problems. I had no hope left in my life. In such a situation, I came to know about Dr. Lovlina Nadir one day and I met her. I had so many major problems like ovary cyst ,hernia,diabetes. I was depressed but when i talk to Dr.loveleena a confidence came ,my such big problems were solved by Dr. Lovleena Nadir very well step by step. Like a mother she gave me second birth.¬† I couldn't have done it without her. She is a lifesaver. Thank you Dr. Lovleena Nadir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is a very brilliant gynaecologist.
I went to her for my fibroids problem.
I had changed doctors before reaching her three times.
She understood that I have been taking a lot of medicine for past 9 months and immediately took me for ultrasound.
Gave me details of my problem and suggested me laproscopic surgery.
During surgery she took a very good care of me.
After surgery she is taking care of me whenever I need apart from old appointment.
I fully recommend her to any one suffering from any gynae related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review: I am so glad and thankful to god that Dr.Loveleena delivered my twin babies..such an amazing doctor she is and more than that she is such a good human being and soo down to earth...Even after so packed with appointments she gives ample of time to her patients..I never felt rushed with her ,,and she always asked me if I have any other questions or doubts...Due to twin pregnancy I had few complications in starting,,but under her guidance and advice everything went absolutely fine..I did not felt uneasy throughout my pregnancy..She was always available on call and wats app even in the middle of the night...She immediately made me feel  very comfortable during my first visit and it felt as if she had been my doctor for years...And above all during my postpartum she stood by me,calmed me down just like my mother...Can‚Äôt thank her enough..*** ** *** **** *************..would highly recommend her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was suffering with endometriosis and was looking for very good doctor in whose hand i feel safe for surgery as i was very nervous. I met Dr Loveleena  and in first interaction , got impressed with her involvement with patient. The bond of love and care created by her makes you calm and easy to go for surgery. 

She did my hysterotomy surgery and it went smooth . I am recovering now without any issues or pains. 

Dr Loveleena ensures to answer every query with patience and gives good advices during recovery . She is very prompt in replying your messages.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Loveleena in July, 2021 going by the word of mouth of my sister. It was for a large dermoid cyst in my left ovary. She explained every aspect of the situation in great detail. I was initially skeptical about getting it removed through laprosocopy as I dnt have any family for now. She cleared our doubts and made us understand the significance of getting the surgery done ASAP. I got the surgery done two days before and doing absolutely fine. She went out of way to get the best facilities available for us at Fortis La femme and even paid multiple visits to my room despite her busy schedule for getting our billing sorted. I am only praise for her and highly recommend her to anybody reading this review. Thank you so much Dr. Loveleena for everything.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Let me begin by saying that I would recommend her without batting an eyelid! She is a thorough professional with a compassionate and understanding attitude towards her patients. As first time ‚Äòto be parents‚Äô we had a host of queries and questions and she put us at ease right from the word go. We consider it our good fortune to have found an exceptional doctor that combines personal touches and care along with high quality medical care. *** *** * ********* ******** *** ** ********** sensitivity and patience. As a first time mother I had an extremely satisfying experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr Nadir for my entire second pregnancy and my delivery of a boy this June. 
Doctor Nadir is an extremely professional and well qualified Gynecologist and Obstetrician. I had a super smooth pregnancy Asm constant guidance from  Dr. Loveleena on the Do‚Äôs and Don‚Äôts during the pregnancy. She was  extremely approachable and patient through this  time . 
I had a normal vaginal delivery delivery (at Rosewalk, Panchsheel Park) all thanks to Dr. Nadir. She was extremely patient and encouraging during the labor and it was only because of her that I could have a normal delivery. Needless to say the years of experience come into play to ensure a normal delivery for me during the period when the pains were intense. 
I would recommend her ***** **** ** *** ** *** **** ************* *** ************* ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I will start by saying that she is a fine doctor and a even finer person, which is sometimes more important. I had a complicated medication history and a critical surgery pending. It was Dr.Loveleena who was the first doctor among many who said that this surgery can be done laparoscopically without side effects. She successfully had the procedure done and this was within 6 months of another major surgery I had previously.  I have nothing but gratitude and admiration for her expertise. The love and care she provided at an individual level is something me and my husband will never forget.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Words will fall short if one has to describe the experience with Dr Loveleena, she is an angel send by God himself with blessed abilities to help women make their motherhood journey possible. The positivity and sweetness are the great offering of her apart from the perfect treatment. Her diagnosis and follow ups are of highest professional standards. Her key assets are the eye for detail and customized handling of clients. She has been nothing less than a mother to me & shall always be the Godmother of our child. We shall be ever obliged to her and our best wishes for her onward journey !  
Thank you so much Dr Loveleenq... Aanaya(Aparna & Tarun) loves you alotüòç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ********* ***** ***** *** ** *** **** ** *** ***** ** ************  Met a few of them before I met her, a very close friend of mine give me her reference.At first I was hesitant as it was my first pregnancy and had no idea like all other women what to do. She with her humble,caring and super positive attitude won me and my husband over in the first meeting. 
She had an all rounded approach, whether it was my diet, supplements the form of exercise I should be following a complete approach. Got me through my 9 months beautifully and on the final day literally pushed me for a normal delivery which seemed pretty impossible once my contractions started. She  was there throughout my labour kept pushing me and motivating me with soo much Love and affection.  Proud to say that I dint need an epidural and had a smooth delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** ****** *** **** * ***** she was always helpful and explained the problems I was facing during my pregnancy and the medication for it. She was always available on phone for all my problems. She took utmost care during my emergency needs and cured me so well. She delivered what she promised and helped me with normal delivery without any complication. She is very caring and makes your entire journey easy going. I would recommend her to anyone who wants needs genuine care, comfort, best treatment with right commitment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy care and management,Uterine Fibroids,Normal Delivery,
review:
I have just delivered my baby girl two weeks ago and it all went super smooth because of the outstanding experience and care rendered by Dr. Loveleena. Mine was a high risk pregnancy with multiple fibroids and one even partially obstructing for a C-section. Also since I am A-ve blood type, any wrong cut could have led to excessive bleeding and life threatening consequences.

However, Dr. Loveleena had full patience and guided me throughout the process starting 3 weeks before the date of delivery. The timing of her decision to induce the pain was excellent and well thought out. 

Despite my fragile situation, she ensured that I had a perfectly normal delivery and gave birth to a healthy baby girl. I also did not need any blood transfusion and the fibroids were also excellently managed during delivery. 

There are doctors who treat you and you become well and then there are doctors whom you meet and you become well because of their personality. Dr. Loveleena is the latter and her personality is such that anyone would feel a burst of positive energy when one meets her. 

Had it not been for her expertise, I would have been totally stressed out. I cannot thank her enough and cannot recommend her enough to everyone!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
With multiple¬†fibroids (one of them being 10+ cms) and endometriosis, I had constant stomach and back pain along with other issues. I visited 4 gynecologists before meeting Dr. Loveleena. All of them suggested open surgery¬†and were hesitant about Laparoscopy. I kept looking for an expert and found¬†Dr. Loveleena ******* *** **** ************* ** ****** 

She made me feel comfortable and answered all the questions with utmost sincerity.¬†Her caring and super positive attitude won me and my husband over in the first meeting. The surgery was a success and I'm recovering now! 

Dr. Loveleena is hands down my recommendation to everyone. She goes out of the way to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. Always a phone call or text message away, highly prompt *** ********** *** ** *** **** ** *** ****** I can't thank her enough!!
